link.title: Authentication
link.description: Do authentication on this {url} and paste the authentication code

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Blueprint is allowed.
abort.already_setup: You can only configure a single Nest account.
abort.no_flows: You need to configure Nest before being able to authenticate with it. [Please read the instructions](https://www.home-assistant.io/components/nest/).
abort.authorize_url_fail: Unknown error generating an authorize url.
